argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hpg.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | hpg.d | |- .- = ( dist ` G ) |
| 3 |  | hpg.i | |- I = ( Itv ` G ) |
| 4 |  | hpg.o | |- O = { <. a , b >. | ( ( a e. ( P \ D ) /\ b e. ( P \ D ) ) /\ E. t e. D t e. ( a I b ) ) } |
| 5 |  | opphl.l | |- L = ( LineG ` G ) |
| 6 |  | opphl.d | |- ( ph -> D e. ran L ) |
| 7 |  | opphl.g | |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 8 |  | oppcom.a | |- ( ph -> A e. P ) |
| 9 |  | oppcom.b | |- ( ph -> B e. P ) |
| 10 |  | oppcom.o | |- ( ph -> A O B ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 8, 9 | #P_islnopp | |- ( ph -> ( A O B <-> ( ( -. A e. D /\ -. B e. D ) /\ E. t e. D t e. ( A I B ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> ( ( -. A e. D /\ -. B e. D ) /\ E. t e. D t e. ( A I B ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_simplld | |- ( ph -> -. A e. D ) |
